text: José Monteiro is the mayor of Celorico da Beira;http://www.freguesias.pt/concelho.php?cod=0903 his party is PS (Partido Socialista), and he is in the final year of his term. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Mayors of places in Portugal Category:Portuguese politicians Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: José Francisco Gomes Monteiro
